name: 3rd International Conference on Knowledge Engineering and Applications
content: The objective of ICKEA is to present the latest research and results of scientists (professors, doctoral students, and post-doc scientists) related to Knowledge Engineering and Applications topics. This conference provides opportunities for delegates from different areas to exchange new ideas, applications and experiences face to face, to establish business or research relations, and to find global partners for future collaboration. We hope that the conference results in significant contributions to the knowledge base in these scientific fields.
